scripts.installDep: npm i --force --prefix projects/emailrater && npm i --force --prefix projects/emailrater/client && npm i --force --prefix projects/pokemonwar && npm i --force --prefix projects/calculator && npm i --force --prefix=client/root && npm i --force --prefix projects/dragndrop"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run build --prefix client/root" "npm run build --prefix projects/calculator" "npm run build --prefix projects/dragndrop" "npm run build --prefix projects/pokemonwar" "npm run build --prefix projects/emailrater/client" && nodemon index.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm i --prefix projects/emailrater && npm i --prefix projects/emailrater/client && npm i --prefix projects/pokemonwar && npm i --prefix projects/calculator && npm i --prefix=client/root && npm i --prefix projects/dragndrop && npm run build --prefix projects/emailrater/client && npm run build --prefix=client/root && npm run build --prefix projects/calculator && npm run build --prefix projects/dragndrop && npm run build --prefix projects/pokemonwar
